resources.string:
You need a login set to be able to log into the app. 

 A login set contains of five information: 
	- name (arbitrary): e.g. My School Login 
	- server url: e.g. urania.webuntis.com:1234 
	- school name: e.g. my_school 
	- user name: my_login_name 
	- password (optional): my_password 

 + You have to provide a name to differentiate between multiple login sets. 
+ The server url is the same url you use to log into WebUntis via a webbrowser. 
+ You have to use the same login information you use to log into the WebUntis website. 
+ If your school provides SSL, you can enforce to log in securely.
A LoginSet with that name already exists
Please enter at least name, server url, school and username
